abstract: At a news conference, State Senator Eric Adams said that he and other city leaders had asked Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. to investigate the police three months ago, and hadn't heard back.
snippet: At a news conference, State Senator Eric Adams said that he and other city leaders had asked Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. to investigate the police three months ago, and hadn't heard back.

headline.main: Officials Renew Call for U.S. Review of Stop and Frisk Policy
